Articles.Content:
Most people in the South can barely speak English even. Dx

Hold on you get on here and when you find something offensive, you gripe about it. Then you post something like that? Come on daemon, why would you be like that?

But most people in the South do say "Coke"short for "Coca-Cola" no "k"). Most people in the South can barely speak English even. Dx

I assume you mean south america.

Not everyone in the South says "Coke". I say "Soda". Some people from the North say "Pop". (not a European thing)

But most people in the South do say "Coke" (short for "Coca-Cola" no "k"). Most people in the South can barely speak English even. Dx

Honestly Daemon, if you mean Murican south you should learn your facts.

@ fleetmaster (in reply to earlier post - I dont know how to do the qoutey thingy)

Yeah, that's pretty much why I built it. I will post some screenshots when I get home, but I am at school right now. Also, this is also the reason it is VTOL, to provide a steady firing platform.

Edited October 28, 2013 by Deathsoul097

I assume you mean south america.

I mean Louisiana. People in Texas can speak okay.
try this for pics and this for craft files at school... works for me so :shrug:

I mean Louisiana. People in Texas can speak okay.

*facepalm*

@briansun:why would they block mediafire?
Can anyone tell me why ive been waiting almost 24 hours for zekes to destroy my crappy fuel tanker? and ok its set as my avatar

*facepalm*

@briansun:why would they block mediafire?

" is categorized as computers.filehosting"

For real. Where is zekes

Yes i know im impatient. thats just who i am!
um, maybe he's sick or something

I mean Louisiana. People in Texas can speak okay.

Im from Alabama

But your still offending people by making them sound uneducated. That would be like me saying people in New Jersey can't speak because of their accent. (no offense if your from the north, and if you are offended I'm really sorry).

For real. Where is zekes

Yes i know im impatient. thats just who i am!

Plus not to mention different time zones. Patience young one, patience.

Fine....... Im basically doing a KSP adventure challenge right now and cheating through it cause i suck at ksp. Im good at blowing stuff up but not getting to planets.

And my picture works

Honestly Daemon, if you mean Murican south you should learn your facts.

Obviously, you don't live here. "What time it is?" "Where you at?" "That ain't it." "Y'all cain't [sic] talk no English." Every day. Like the beating of the old man's heart, it drives one to madness!

Im from Alabama

But your still offending people by making them sound uneducated. That would be like me saying people in New Jersey can't speak because of their accent. (no offense if your from the north, and if you are offended I'm really sorry).

They /are/ uneducated. That's the state of being unaware of things, such as grammar and spelling. It's inappropriate to be offended by being considered uneducated. There's little or nothing you can do about it.

Edited October 28, 2013 by daemonCaptrix

Americans arguing about pronunciation lol.

If you want to learn proper English come over to this side of the pond lol.

And where is Zekes atm? he's taking ages.
Hey can I attack some one? I need something to do as i wait for zekes. daemon is there something of yours i could attack some how? you can set up how i must do it, i just want something to do.

Americans arguing about pronunciation lol.

If you want to learn proper English come over to this side of the pond lol.

And where is Zekes atm? he's taking ages.

I know he is still in grade school so he may not be home yet. Give him time

Ok. So while i wait can i fight war eagle or deamon?

And my profile picture is a hipster corgi playing World Of Warcraft :3

I know he is still in grade school so he may not be home yet. Give him time

I like being on mimterm,ever vigilant.
So? can i attack anyone?

Hey can I attack some one? I need something to do as i wait for zekes. daemon is there something of yours i could attack some how? you can set up how i must do it, i just want something to do.

If you have ships, I would recommend practicing.

Set up your own battles and fight yourself. Kinda like playing chess against yourself.

Thats what I do during my time off, getting ready for battle, and during so I can keep my aim on par

Corgi certainly is living up to his name!

steady boy
Yo,over here.
